mapper.select: SELECT E_EVTCODE, E_NTTILTE, E_STARTDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, E_ENDDATE, ( SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON MC.MS_CODE = SC.MS_CODE WHERE TE.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE AND TE.E_DISCOUNT = SC.SUB_CODE ) AS DISCOUNT_VALUE FROM TR_EVENT TE WHERE E_GUBUN = 1

SELECT E_EVTCODE, E_NTTILTE, E_STARTDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, E_ENDDATE, ( SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON MC.MS_CODE = SC.MS_CODE WHERE TE.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE AND TE.E_DISCOUNT = SC.SUB_CODE ) AS DISCOUNT_VALUE FROM TR_EVENT TE WHERE E_GUBUN = 1 AND SYSDATE <= E_ENDDATE

SELECT E_EVTCODE, E_NTTILTE, E_STARTDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, E_ENDDATE, ( SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON MC.MS_CODE = SC.MS_CODE WHERE TE.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE AND TE.E_DISCOUNT = SC.SUB_CODE ) AS DISCOUNT_VALUE FROM TR_EVENT TE
E_GUBUN = 1 AND E_EVTCODE= #{e_evtcode}

SELECT TF.F_FDCODE, TF.E_EVTCODE, TE.E_NTTILTE, TE.E_STARTDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, TE.E_ENDDATE, TF.FC_1ST, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TFC.FC_2ND = 0 AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_1ST, TF.FC_2ND, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TFC.FC_3RD = 0) AS FCNAME_2ND, TF.FC_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FCNAME_3RD, (SELECT TFC.FC_ISBLOCK FROM TR_FOODCODE TFC WHERE TF.FC_1ST = TFC.FC_1ST AND TF.FC_2ND = TFC.FC_2ND AND TF.FC_3RD = TFC.FC_3RD) AS FC_ISBLOCK, TF.F_FOODNAME, TF.F_PRICE, TF.F_ISBLOCK, TF.MS_CODE, TE.E_DISCOUNT, ( SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON MC.MS_CODE = SC.MS_CODE WHERE TE.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE AND TE.E_DISCOUNT = SC.SUB_CODE ) AS DISCOUNT_VALUE FROM TR_FOOD TF LEFT OUTER JOIN TR_EVENT TE ON TF.E_EVTCODE = TE.E_EVTCODE
TE.E_GUBUN IS NULL OR TE.E_GUBUN = 1 TE.E_EVTCODE= #{evtcode}
